channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stocks Rise as U.S. Election Day Starts
item.description: Major indexes crept higher as U.S. voters headed to the polls to elect their next president.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Little Changed
item.description: Natural gas futures were little changed, edging higher with some support from an expected rise in heating demand and a pickup in LNG feedgas flows.

item.title: Palantir shares jump 23% to record on uplifting guidance
item.description: Palantir shares soared to a record on Tuesday after the software company reported better-than-expected results and issued uplifting guidance.

item.title: Palantir shares surge 20% on revenue outlook
item.description: Palantir is seeing a pickup in artificial intelligence among its U.S. government client base.

item.title: Falling Rates, Rising Tax Risk Give Some Shine to Muni Bonds
item.description: Municipal bond issuance in the U.S. is heating up as local governments ramp up borrowing and investors gobble up the low-risk securities..

item.title: Burger King parent Restaurant Brands falls short of third-quarter expectations
item.description: Net sales climbed 24.7%, largely thanks to the company's acquisitions of its largest U.S. Burger King franchisee and its Popeyes business in China.

item.title: Gold Futures Remain Steady as Market Braces for U.S. Election Result
item.description: Gold investors are holding steady as the market focuses on the U.S. presidential election.

item.title: Yum Brands earnings miss estimates as KFC, Pizza Hut report same-store sales declines
item.description: KFC and Pizza Hut both reported steeper-than-expected declines in their same-store sales.

item.title: Sterling Might Outperform After Overdone Post-Budget Falls
item.description: The dollar weakened further after the U.S. trade deficit widened, as expected. Meanwhile, Monex Europe says sterling might outperform.

item.title: Nintendo profit plunges 69% as it cuts forecast for sales of ageing Switch console
item.description: Investors are waiting for news surrounding a successor to the Switch which they hope will re-energize Nintendo's gaming business.
